title: Requirements Gathering for Microbial Fuel Cell System
description: Gather and document the functional (e.g., power output, scalability, efficiency) and non-functional requirements (e.g., safety, compatibility with existing wastewater treatment systems) of the microbial fuel cell system. Consider potential future modifications or upgrades. Also, outline the criteria for evaluating these requirements and their impact on the overall system.

title: Design Concept for Microbial Fuel Cell System
description: Develop a high-level design concept for the microbial fuel cell system, including hardware and software components.
dependencies: Requirements Gathering for Microbial Fuel Cell System

title: Backend Development for Data Collection and Processing
description: Develop the backend of the microbial fuel cell system, handling data collection, storage, and processing.
dependencies: Design Concept for Microbial Fuel Cell System

title: Frontend Development for User Interface and Visualization
description: Develop the frontend of the microbial fuel cell system, providing a user-friendly interface and visualization tools.
dependencies: Design Concept for Microbial Fuel Cell System

title: Database Design and Integration
description: Design the database schema for storing microbial fuel cell system data and integrate it with the backend.
dependencies: Backend Development for Data Collection and Processing

title: Deploy Microbial Fuel Cell System on Test Environment
description: Set up a test environment for the microbial fuel cell system and deploy the developed components.
dependencies: Backend Development for Data Collection and Processing
Frontend Development for User Interface and Visualization

title: Test Microbial Fuel Cell System Components
description: Perform unit tests, integration tests, and system tests on the various components of the microbial fuel cell system.
dependencies: Deploy Microbial Fuel Cell System on Test Environment

title: Security Audit for Microbial Fuel Cell System
description: Perform a security audit of the microbial fuel cell system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.
dependencies: Deploy Microbial Fuel Cell System on Test Environment

title: Detailed Documentation for Microbial Fuel Cell System
description: Create detailed and comprehensive documentation for the microbial fuel cell system, including user manuals (operating procedures, safety guidelines, maintenance guides), developer guides (system architecture, API documentation, troubleshooting guide), technical reports (system performance data, research findings) and clearly defined sections for each document. The documentation should be easy to understand and accessible to both technical and non-technical users.
dependencies: Deploy Microbial Fuel Cell System on Test Environment

title: Iterative Refinement and Integration
description: Address issues found during testing and iteratively refine the microbial fuel cell system, integrating components as they are ready.
dependencies: Test Microbial Fuel Cell System Components

title: Prepare Microbial Fuel Cell System for Deployment
description: Prepare the microbial fuel cell system for deployment, including packaging and configuration.

title: Deploy Microbial Fuel Cell System in Production Environment
description: Deploy the microbial fuel cell system in a production environment for real-world testing and usage.
dependencies: Prepare Microbial Fuel Cell System for Deployment
